game_description: Story There was a sudden report that a huge dragon like a mountain is heading towards the city. You become the commander. Fight off the dragon and save the people! Game Controls During the battle with the dragon Use the buttons and triggers on your OculusTouch to Use the OculusTouch buttons and triggers to fire bullets.
Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), English (UK), Japanese
review_1: Video review here: https://youtu.be/jonDtVyEqTI Why oh why does this game have no reviews or ratings yet?! Sure it's a simple game, but there is nothing else anywhere in VR that will give you the same workout for your fingers, hands and forearms than this game will!
review_2: Don't think it is entertaining in any way or really makes use of VR.
